name: Infernoble Knight Maugis
text: If this card is sent to the GY: You can shuffle 3 of your other FIRE Warrior monsters and/or "Noble Arms" cards that are banished and/or in your GY into the Deck; draw 1 card. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip this card to that target you control. You can only use these effects of "Infernoble Knight Maugis" once per turn. A monster equipped with this card cannot be destroyed by battle.
